## ParsedEvent

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/router/EventsRouter.ts" sourceLine="19" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents a parsed event with its handlers

```ts title="Signature"
interface ParsedEvent {
    event: string;
    path: string;
    listeners: string[];
    namespace: string | null;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### event

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

Name of the event derived from directory name
### path

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

Absolute path to the event directory
### listeners

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string[]`}   />

Array of file paths to event listener handlers
### namespace

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string | null`}   />

Namespace of the event
